name: Meteor
description: A full-stack JavaScript platform for developing modern web and mobile applications. Meteor includes a key set of technologies for building connected-client reactive applications, a build tool, and a curated set of packages from the Node.js and general JavaScript community.

Getting Started.val: Install basic npm packages in project

Core.val: True if running in client environment.
True if running in server environment.
Run code when a client or a server starts.
Generate an absolute URL pointing to the application
A string containing the name of the release with which the project was built.It is undefined if the project was built using a git checkout of Meteor.

Publish and Subscribe.val: Publish a record set. Available on the server only
Subscribe to a record set publish on the server. Returns a handle that provides stop() and ready() methods.Available on client.

Methods.val: Defines functions that can be invoked over the network by clients.'methods' is an object of functions
Invokes a method by passing it's name and any number of arguments as well as an option callback function.
This class represents a symbolic error thrown by a method.

Invoke a method passing an array of arguments.It is just like Meteor.call, except that the method arguments are passed as an array rather than directly as arguments, and you can specify options about how the client executes the method.

Check.val: Check that a value matches a pattern. If the value does not match the pattern, throw a Match.Error.Particularly useful to assert that arguments to a function have the right types and structure.
Returns true if the value matches the pattern.

Server connections.val: This method returns an object containing the status of the connection between the client and the server.
Force an immediate reconnection attempt if the client is not connected to the server.

Disconnect the client from the server.While the client is disconnected it will not receive updates to collections, method calls will be queued until the connection is reestablished, and hot code push will be disabled.
Register a callback to be called when a new DDP connection is made to the server.
Connect to the server of a different Meteor application to subscribe to its document sets and invoke its remote methods.

Collections.val: Finds the first document that matches the selector, as ordered by sort and skip options.
Insert a document in the collection. Returns its unique _id.
Modify one or more documents in the collection. Returns the number of affected documents.

Modify one or more documents in the collection, or insert one if no matching documents were found. Returns an object with keys numberAffected (the number of documents modified) and insertedId (the unique _id of the document that was inserted, if any).
Allow users to write directly to this collection from client code, subject to limitations you define.
Returns the Collection object corresponding to this collection from the npm mongodb driver module which is wrapped by Mongo.Collection.
Returns the Db object corresponding to this collection's database connection from the npm mongodb driver module which is wrapped by Mongo.Collection.
